entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
